PlayOneCategoryPageJSON.stNumWCardShown: cards will be shown at once.
PlayOneCategoryPageJSON.stTut0_1_2: Choose Basic in {0} to start this tutorial
PlayOneCategoryPageJSON.stTut1_1_1: Click {0} in {1} to enlarge all cards.
PlayOneCategoryPageJSON.stTut1_2_1: Click {0} in {1} to shrink all cards.
PlayOneCategoryPageJSON.stTut1_3_1_1: Click {0}<sub>Hide</sub> to hide this tutorial and tap a coorect card to annihilate it.
PlayOneCategoryPageJSON.stTut1_4_Content: Choose a voice beside the {0} button in {1}.
PlayOneCategoryPageJSON.stTut1_4_1_Content: Click {0} will play the sentence with different voice.
PlayOneCategoryPageJSON.stTut1_4To5: Now you know how to change voices.
PlayOneCategoryPageJSON.stTut1_5_Content: Because the total number of cards might be larger than '{0}', you can change shown cards by clicking {1} in {2}. By the way, the number '{0}' can be set by yourself.
PlayOneCategoryPageJSON.stTut1_5To6: Now you know how to change cards!
PlayOneCategoryPageJSON.stTut1_6_Title: 1.6 Basic - Extra info for each Card
PlayOneCategoryPageJSON.stTut1_6_Content:
Hide me at first by clicking {0}Hide.
Then, Double click ({1}) any Card will show you a popup for extra info.
PlayOneCategoryPageJSON.stTut1_6To7: Then you should see a popup. If not, it means that it has no extra info.
PlayOneCategoryPageJSON.stTut2_0_Content: Click {0}<sub>Hint</sub> in {1} to use Hint mode.
PlayOneCategoryPageJSON.stTut2_1_Content: Click {0} at first, then click at any one Card.
PlayOneCategoryPageJSON.stTut2_1To2: You'll see its answer in the below textblock.
PlayOneCategoryPageJSON.stTut2_2_Content:
Well, press the button {0} will show the answers in succession started from the one selected in 2.1.
Press {1} will pause the sequence.
PlayOneCategoryPageJSON.stTut2_2To3: Now you know how to show cards' answer in succession.
PlayOneCategoryPageJSON.stTut3_0_Title: 3. KeyIn: Annihilate a Card by Input Correct Answer
PlayOneCategoryPageJSON.stTut3_0_Content: Click {0}<sub>KeyIn</sub> in {1} to use KeyIn mode.
PlayOneCategoryPageJSON.stTut3_1_Content: Click {0} at first, then click at any one Card.
PlayOneCategoryPageJSON.stTut3_1_2_Content: Key in {0} into the textBox then press ENTER key to submit this answer.
PlayOneCategoryPageJSON.stTut_End_Content: Click {0} to stop this tutorial. Thanks.
